thread.title: Get Ready For Summer Festival Season With This Turbo-Charged Mat The Alien Set
thread.title_full: Get Ready For Summer Festival Season With This Turbo-Charged Mat The Alien Set

author: THUMP Canada Staff
title: Get Ready For Summer Festival Season With This Turbo-Charged Mat The Alien Set
text:
March 15, 2017 4:55 PM By THUMP Canada Staff Share Photo by Sarah Koury 
After performing at British Columbia's Shambhala a whopping 14 times, it's pretty safe to say that UK-born, Whistler-based DJ and producer Mat The Alien is a mainstay at the popular Canadian electronic festival. While the 2017 edition is still 146 days away, today the Really Good Recordings boss has shared his hour-and-a-half 2016 Pagoda Stage set with THUMP. 
As anybody who's seen him live before would expect, it's jam-packed with drum and bass, grime, hip-hop, and UK garage hits, not to mention a handful of his own skull-rattling edits and remixes (Big Krit's "My Sub Pt. 3," Howie Lee's "Flame Fighters," Travis Scott's "Antidote," to name just a few). By the time he ends with the 1-2 punch of DJ Pump's slowed-down "King Kunta" edit and Diemantle's playful James Brown bootleg, you'll be booking your tickets to British Columbia for August. 
Listen below while you wait for the snow to melt and get more info on Shambhala here . Topics:
